text.title: Text
text.description: The text to convert to speech
examples: Hello! This is a test of the text to speech system.

voice.title: Voice
voice.description: Voice ID or preset name (e.g., 'Rachel', 'Aria', or a voice ID)

voice_settings.title: Voice Settings
voice_settings.description: Optional voice settings to customize speech generation

stability.title: Stability
stability.description: Voice stability (0-1). Lower values introduce broader emotional range.

similarity_boost.title: Similarity Boost
similarity_boost.description: How closely to replicate the original voice (0-1)

style.title: Style
style.description: Style exaggeration intensity (0-1). Only for eleven_multilingual_v2.

use_speaker_boost.title: Use Speaker Boost
use_speaker_boost.description: Boost similarity to original speaker (increases latency)

language_code.title: Language Code
language_code.description: ISO 639-1 language code to enforce language for the model
